body.content: Bianca, a fine performance, but I confess, my stomach is rumbling louder than the applause. You look like you could use a good meal too.

reflection: I encountered Bianca Rizzo, an Artisti, at the theater. Both of us appear to be suffering from hunger, a shared problem that presents an immediate, relatable common ground. Initiating a conversation based on this mutual need is a pragmatic approach, aligning with my adaptable and direct personality. While she is of a different social class, establishing rapport with various citizens can broaden my network and potentially uncover unforeseen opportunities, even if only for basic needs like finding a good meal. This interaction serves as a low-risk way to build a new connection in Venice.
